page.title: 01DATCHWORTH AND WOOLMER GREEN
page.content: The area of{Datchworth,Woolmer Green {and Oaklands}is set in countryside, about 40 kilometres from London.It is transversed from North to South by the main railway line from Kings Cross,the A1 motorway, and the B197, which is the old A1. Datchworth is a large spread out village set in rural surroundings, Woolmer Green is smaller and on each side of the B197, while Oaklands is a much newer,growing area of good quality housing. There are schools in all three areas, and small shops for local shopping. Garages are situated on the main road, and all three areas have their quota of pubs. Much of the surrounding land is { {arable farm land}owned by 3 or 4 separate farms.
